abstractive.text: The project manager opens the meeting by going over the minutes of the last meeting.

abstractive.text: The interface specialist begins her presentation by highlighting important remote functions and showing examples of remote interfaces.

extractive.text: Now as an interface designer , I would give more emphasis on the interface , how the remote looks like

extractive.speaker: B

extractive.speaker: B
extractive.text: Then there should d uh there should be some buttons which can control features like the colour , colour of the picture , the contrast , sharpness , brightness of the picture .

extractive.text: Now there should be a memory switch .
extractive.text_fr: Maintenant, il doit être un commutateur de mémoire .

extractive.text_fr: Maintenant, la caractéristique la plus importante que je voudrais avoir dans ma télécommande serait la fonctionnalité de reconnaissance vocale .

abstractive.text: The marketing expert presents, talking about user preferences for a small, simple, eye-catching, cute, appealing, and functional remote.

abstractive.text: Fruit and vegetable shapes are popular this year, so a soft, spongy remote perhaps covered with cloth could make the item marketable.
